PreceptDef.label: heretical
PreceptDef.description:
The creation of thralls by Sloads is an affront to all that is divine, any sload that creates them should be burnt alive.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - The creation of thralls by Sloads is outlawed, disabling the use of the <color=#E5E54C>create thrall</color> ability.

PreceptDef.label: allowed
PreceptDef.description: A corpse is a corpse, no one should care what happens to it.
